caller_intent: The caller (Corbin Dirks, an agent) wanted to set up an automatic credit card payment for a policyholder (Gilbert Knight) with Auto Owners Insurance.
resolution_steps: Agent Michelle confirmed the policy/account number (103551035) and the insured's name (Gilbert Knight).
Michelle guided the caller through entering credit card details (number, expiration, CVV) for auto pay setup.
Auto pay was activated with the next payment scheduled for September 22nd.
summary: An agent called Auto Owners Insurance to set up automatic credit card payments for a policyholder. The agent provided the policy number and credit card details, and the system successfully activated the auto-pay with a scheduled payment date. The call concluded with confirmation of the setup.
